alif-lam-ra kitābun anzalnāhu ilayka litukh'rija al-nāsa mina al-ẓulumāti ilā al-nūri bi-idh'ni rabbihim ilā ṣirāṭi al-ʿazīzi al-ḥamīdi
al-lahi alladhī lahu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wawaylun lil'kāfirīna min ʿadhābin shadīdin
alladhīna yastaḥibbūna al-ḥayata al-dun'yā ʿalā al-ākhirati wayaṣuddūna ʿan sabīli al-lahi wayabghūnahā ʿiwajan ulāika fī ḍalālin baʿīdin
wamā arsalnā min rasūlin illā bilisāni qawmihi liyubayyina lahum fayuḍillu al-lahu man yashāu wayahdī man yashāu wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
walaqad arsalnā mūsā biāyātinā an akhrij qawmaka mina al-ẓulumāti ilā al-nūri wadhakkir'hum bi-ayyāmi al-lahi inna fī dhālika laāyātin likulli ṣabbārin shakūrin

wa-idh qāla mūsā liqawmihi udh'kurū niʿ'mata al-lahi ʿalaykum idh anjākum min āli fir'ʿawna yasūmūnakum sūa al-ʿadhābi wayudhabbiḥūna abnāakum wayastaḥyūna nisāakum wafī dhālikum balāon min rabbikum ʿaẓīmun
wa-idh ta-adhana rabbukum la-in shakartum la-azīdannakum wala-in kafartum inna ʿadhābī lashadīdun
waqāla mūsā in takfurū antum waman fī al-arḍi jamīʿan fa-inna al-laha laghaniyyun ḥamīdun

alam yatikum naba-u alladhīna min qablikum qawmi nūḥin waʿādin wathamūda wa-alladhīna min baʿdihim lā yaʿlamuhum illā al-lahu jāathum rusuluhum bil-bayināti faraddū aydiyahum fī afwāhihim waqālū innā kafarnā bimā ur'sil'tum bihi wa-innā lafī shakkin mimmā tadʿūnanā ilayhi murībin

qālat rusuluhum afī al-lahi shakkun fāṭiri al-samāwāti wal-arḍi yadʿūkum liyaghfira lakum min dhunūbikum wayu-akhirakum ilā ajalin musamman qālū in antum illā basharun mith'lunā turīdūna an taṣuddūnā ʿammā kāna yaʿbudu ābāunā fatūnā bisul'ṭānin mubīnin

qālat lahum rusuluhum in naḥnu illā basharun mith'lukum walākinna al-laha yamunnu ʿalā man yashāu min ʿibādihi wamā kāna lanā an natiyakum bisul'ṭānin illā bi-idh'ni al-lahi waʿalā al-lahi falyatawakkali al-mu'minūna
wamā lanā allā natawakkala ʿalā al-lahi waqad hadānā subulanā walanaṣbiranna ʿalā mā ādhaytumūnā waʿalā al-lahi falyatawakkali al-mutawakilūna
waqāla alladhīna kafarū lirusulihim lanukh'rijannakum min arḍinā aw lataʿūdunna fī millatinā fa-awḥā ilayhim rabbuhum lanuh'likanna al-ẓālimīna
walanus'kinannakumu al-arḍa min baʿdihim dhālika liman khāfa maqāmī wakhāfa waʿīdi
wa-is'taftaḥū wakhāba kullu jabbārin ʿanīdin
min warāihi jahannamu wayus'qā min māin ṣadīdin
yatajarraʿuhu walā yakādu yusīghuhu wayatīhi al-mawtu min kulli makānin wamā huwa bimayyitin wamin warāihi ʿadhābun ghalīẓun
mathalu alladhīna kafarū birabbihim aʿmāluhum karamādin ish'taddat bihi al-rīḥu fī yawmin ʿāṣifin lā yaqdirūna mimmā kasabū ʿalā shayin dhālika huwa al-ḍalālu al-baʿīdu
alam tara anna al-laha khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa bil-ḥaqi in yasha yudh'hib'kum wayati bikhalqin jadīdin
wamā dhālika ʿalā al-lahi biʿazīzin

wabarazū lillahi jamīʿan faqāla al-ḍuʿafāu lilladhīna is'takbarū innā kunnā lakum tabaʿan fahal antum mugh'nūna ʿannā min ʿadhābi al-lahi min shayin qālū law hadānā al-lahu lahadaynākum sawāon ʿalaynā ajaziʿ'nā am ṣabarnā mā lanā min maḥīṣin

waqāla al-shayṭānu lammā quḍiya al-amru inna al-laha waʿadakum waʿda al-ḥaqi wawaʿadttukum fa-akhlaftukum wamā kāna liya ʿalaykum min sul'ṭānin illā an daʿawtukum fa-is'tajabtum lī falā talūmūnī walūmū anfusakum mā anā bimuṣ'rikhikum wamā antum bimuṣ'rikhiyya innī kafartu bimā ashraktumūni min qablu inna al-ẓālimīna lahum ʿadhābun alīmun
wa-ud'khila alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti jannātin tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru khālidīna fīhā bi-idh'ni rabbihim taḥiyyatuhum fīhā salāmun
alam tara kayfa ḍaraba al-lahu mathalan kalimatan ṭayyibatan kashajaratin ṭayyibatin aṣluhā thābitun wafarʿuhā fī al-samāi
tu'tī ukulahā kulla ḥīnin bi-idh'ni rabbihā wayaḍribu al-lahu al-amthāla lilnnāsi laʿallahum yatadhakkarūna
wamathalu kalimatin khabīthatin kashajaratin khabīthatin uj'tuthat min fawqi al-arḍi mā lahā min qarārin
yuthabbitu al-lahu alladhīna āmanū bil-qawli al-thābiti fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wafī al-ākhirati wayuḍillu al-lahu al-ẓālimīna wayafʿalu al-lahu mā yashāu
alam tara ilā alladhīna baddalū niʿ'mata al-lahi kuf'ran wa-aḥallū qawmahum dāra al-bawāri
jahannama yaṣlawnahā wabi'sa al-qarāru
wajaʿalū lillahi andādan liyuḍillū ʿan sabīlihi qul tamattaʿū fa-inna maṣīrakum ilā al-nāri
qul liʿibādiya alladhīna āmanū yuqīmū al-ṣalata wayunfiqū mimmā razaqnāhum sirran waʿalāniyatan min qabli an yatiya yawmun lā bayʿun fīhi walā khilālun

al-lahu alladhī khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa wa-anzala mina al-samāi māan fa-akhraja bihi mina al-thamarāti riz'qan lakum wasakhara lakumu al-ful'ka litajriya fī al-baḥri bi-amrihi wasakhara lakumu al-anhāra
wasakhara lakumu al-shamsa wal-qamara dāibayni wasakhara lakumu al-layla wal-nahāra
waātākum min kulli mā sa-altumūhu wa-in taʿuddū niʿ'mata al-lahi lā tuḥ'ṣūhā inna al-insāna laẓalūmun kaffārun
wa-idh qāla ib'rāhīmu rabbi ij'ʿal hādhā al-balada āminan wa-uj'nub'nī wabaniyya an naʿbuda al-aṣnāma
rabbi innahunna aḍlalna kathīran mina al-nāsi faman tabiʿanī fa-innahu minnī waman ʿaṣānī fa-innaka ghafūrun raḥīmun

rabbanā innī askantu min dhurriyyatī biwādin ghayri dhī zarʿin ʿinda baytika al-muḥarami rabbanā liyuqīmū al-ṣalata fa-ij'ʿal afidatan mina al-nāsi tahwī ilayhim wa-ur'zuq'hum mina al-thamarāti laʿallahum yashkurūna
rabbanā innaka taʿlamu mā nukh'fī wamā nuʿ'linu wamā yakhfā ʿalā al-lahi min shayin fī al-arḍi walā fī al-samāi
al-ḥamdu lillahi alladhī wahaba lī ʿalā al-kibari is'māʿīla wa-is'ḥāqa inna rabbī lasamīʿu al-duʿāi
rabbi ij'ʿalnī muqīma al-ṣalati wamin dhurriyyatī rabbanā wataqabbal duʿāi
rabbanā igh'fir lī waliwālidayya walil'mu'minīna yawma yaqūmu al-ḥisābu
walā taḥsabanna al-laha ghāfilan ʿammā yaʿmalu al-ẓālimūna innamā yu-akhiruhum liyawmin tashkhaṣu fīhi al-abṣāru
muh'ṭiʿīna muq'niʿī ruūsihim lā yartaddu ilayhim ṭarfuhum wa-afidatuhum hawāon
wa-andhiri al-nāsa yawma yatīhimu al-ʿadhābu fayaqūlu alladhīna ẓalamū rabbanā akhir'nā ilā ajalin qarībin nujib daʿwataka wanattabiʿi al-rusula awalam takūnū aqsamtum min qablu mā lakum min zawālin
wasakantum fī masākini alladhīna ẓalamū anfusahum watabayyana lakum kayfa faʿalnā bihim waḍarabnā lakumu al-amthāla
waqad makarū makrahum waʿinda al-lahi makruhum wa-in kāna makruhum litazūla min'hu al-jibālu
falā taḥsabanna al-laha mukh'lifa waʿdihi rusulahu inna al-laha ʿazīzun dhū intiqāmin
yawma tubaddalu al-arḍu ghayra al-arḍi wal-samāwātu wabarazū lillahi al-wāḥidi al-qahāri
watarā al-muj'rimīna yawma-idhin muqarranīna fī al-aṣfādi
sarābīluhum min qaṭirānin wataghshā wujūhahumu al-nāru
liyajziya al-lahu kulla nafsin mā kasabat inna al-laha sarīʿu al-ḥisābi
hādhā balāghun lilnnāsi waliyundharū bihi waliyaʿlamū annamā huwa ilāhun wāḥidun waliyadhakkara ulū al-albābi
